00111 struct _upk_conn_handle {
00112     uint32_t                version_id;                    
00113     int                     fd;                            
00114     char                    cl_name[UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN];   
00115     upk_pkt_buf_t           readbuf[UPK_MAX_PACKET_SIZE];  
00116     uint8_t                 n_hdr_bytes_read;              
00117     size_t                  n_remaining_read;              
00118     //upk_net_callback_t      after_read_callback;           /*!< after an entire packet read, call this callback */
00119     upk_netmsg_queue_meta_t writeq;                        
00120     upk_payload_t           last_pkt_data;
